parameters.name: AccessRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the cloud service is accessed.

parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the CEN instance.

parameters.name: Host
parameters.description:
The service address of the cloud service.

You can enter a domain name, an IP address, or a CIDR block.

parameters.name: HostRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the cloud service is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeChildInstanceRegions](~~132080~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: HostVpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) that is associated with the cloud service.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: **1** to **50**.
